title: My Engagement Was Annulled Because of My Younger Sister Was a Saint, but I’m the Fairies’ Beloved Child - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Beautiful Female Lead   Broken Engagement   Calm Protagonist   Child Abuse   Child Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Enemies Become Allies   Enemies Become Lovers   Fairies   Family Conflict   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Heartwarming   Jealousy   Magic   Nobles   Royalty   Saints   Seeing Things Other Humans Can't   Sibling Rivalry   Timid Protagonist
author: Sakurai Yukina   桜井ゆきな
description:
Margaret Silver, the daughter of the Duke, could see fairies from an early age.

But that was a secret between her and her deceased mother.

Until one day, she met someone who saw Margaret for who she really was, not as the fairies’ beloved child.>
